mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.province AS "province", a.city AS "city", a.district AS "district", a.proname AS "proname", a.role AS "role", a.proportion AS "proportion", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.updatetime AS "updatetime", a.operator AS "operator", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date, a.del_flag
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO settlement_bonus_proportion( id, province, city, district, proname, role, proportion, createtime, updatetime, operator, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{province}, #{city}, #{district}, #{proname}, #{role}, #{proportion}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime}, #{operator}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE settlement_bonus_proportion SET province = #{province}, city = #{city}, district = #{district}, proname = #{proname}, role = #{role}, proportion = #{proportion}, createtime = #{createtime}, updatetime = #{updatetime}, operator = #{operator}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
